ModelContainerProperties | Methods
 
Packagecom.crazyfm.core.mvc.model
Classpublic class ModelContainer
InheritanceModelContainer Model HierarchyObject SignalDispatcher Disposable Object
Implements IModelContainer, org.osflash.signals.events.IBubbleEventHandler
Subclasses Context

Extends IModel and is able to add or remove other IModel objects (can be parent of them). Also receives all signals from children, sub-children and so on.
